comment: Hey Sneha,U r one ofthe best n purehearted person I metso far(keptsaying to others aswell)Thanks4 making me happy n everything easier here.Being with u is verydifferent, umake everyonefeel special isthe mostbeautiful part ofurs.Itwill bevery hard leavinghere n willmiss u themost.
